titlestmt.titleproper: The University of Arizona Graduate Library School scrapbook and records 1969-1986
The University of Arizona Graduate Library School scrapbook and records

profiledesc.creation: Inventory encoded in Oxygen XML editor by Steven Burg. April 07, 2016
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: The University of Arizona Graduate Library School scrapbook and records 1969-1986

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of Arizona. Graduate Library School.

did.abstract: Box 1 includes clippings, publicity, advertising, course offerings, and photographs of faculty and students. Box 2 includes Proposed Program for the Master of Library Science Degree, 1969; Graduate Library School Annual Report of the Director, 1978; Annual Reports to the Committee on Accreditation of the American Library Association, 1974, 1976, 1978, 1979, 1986; and Self Study Report to the Committee on Accreditation of the American Library Association, 1985.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: The University of Arizona Graduate Library School scrapbook and records (AZ 509). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: School was established in 1969; Donald Dickinson was the first director.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Box 1 includes clippings, publicity, advertising, course offerings, and photographs of faculty and students. Box 2 includes Proposed Program for the Master of Library Science Degree, 1969; Graduate Library School Annual Report of the Director, 1978; Annual Reports to the Committee on Accreditation of the American Library Assocation, 1974, 1976, 1978, 1979, 1986; and Self Study Report to the Committee on Accreditation of the American Library Assocation, 1985.
